TransactionStateContext.FundingState: When users contribute Ether to receive tokens during ICO.
TransactionStateContext.RefundState: When users request refunds if funding fails.
TransactionStateContext.MigrationState: When users migrate tokens to a new contract.

ExternalInteractions: Transfers Ether from users to contract in exchange for tokens during ICO.
Transfers tokens from the contract to users based on their Ether contributions.
Migrates tokens to a new contract if migration is enabled.
